txt.en: 'I have spoken deeply with Gandalf, but even he cannot see the end of every path.'
'I have walked many roads in my life, and I will walk many more before it is through.'
'Elladan and Elrohir are like brothers to me, but they have gone away on an errand.'
'Outside, the world is getting dark, but Rivendell remains a beacon against the shadow.'
'Elladan and Elrohir are like brothers to me, but they have gone away on an errand.'
'I have been helping Bilbo with some of his verse. There is much of the old hobbit in Frodo.'
'Outside, the world is getting dark, but Rivendell remains a beacon against the shadow.'
